title: Self-Directed Learning Program for Mastery of Biochemical Metabolic Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational biochemistry concepts (enzymes, substrates, ATP, etc.) and basic metabolic pathways
context.additional_context: Advanced biochemistry metabolic pathway learning program for graduate-level interdisciplinary social science research

learning_goals: Explain key enzymes and regulatory mechanisms in metabolic pathways with 90% accuracy
Analyze interactions between metabolic pathways and apply findings to real-world cases (e.g., diabetes)
Solve metabolic pathway problems within 30 minutes using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
